      • onCollisionWithInteractableModel

        public void onCollisionWithInteractableModel(Interactable interactableModel)
        Determines actions based on what interactable the player comes into contact with. If it is food, player's score and scoreStreak are incremented. If not, the player loses health (unless powered up, which deactivates the powered up).
        Parameters:
        interactableModel - the interactable model

      • setPlayerName

        public void setPlayerName(java.lang.String playerName)
        Sets the player's name.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the new player name
